data.question: Which team has never made the IPL final?
data.info: Until last season only Delhi Capitals had never managed to reach an IPL final.

data.question: Which Indian player has scored the fastest hundred in the IPL?
data.info: In 2010, Yusuf Pathan scored a 37-ball 100 for Rajasthan Royals against Mumbai Indians.

data.question: Which two teams made their IPL debuts in 2011?
data.info: With the introduction of two new teams, a 10-team format was put in place consisting of two groups and 74 matches being played. The knockout stage was changed into a playoff format.

data.question: Which player holds the record for the fastest fifty in IPL?
data.info: KL Rahul scored a 14-ball fifty for Kings XI Punjab (now Punjab Kings) against Delhi Daredevils (now Delhi Capitals) in 2018.

data.question: Who was the captain of the Mumbai Indians in IPL 2012?
data.info: Harbhajan took over from Sachin Tendulkar, who quit captaincy before the start of the season.

data.question: Which among these players has the joint-most ducks in IPL history alongside Harbhajan Singh?
data.info: Parthiv and Harbhajan have been dismissed for nought on 13 occasions in the tournament.

data.question: Who has the highest all-time batting average (having featured in a minimum of 10 matches)?
data.info: KL Rahul, ahead of IPL 2021, had a batting average of 44.86 in 81 matches.

data.question: Which pacer has bowled the highest number of dot balls in the IPL?
data.info: Bhuvneshwar has bowled a total of 1,164 dots.

data.question: Which player has won the most number of IPL orange caps, which are awarded to the seasonâ€™s highest run-scorer?
data.info: Warner has won the orange cap thrice (2015, 2017, 2019).
